data.actual_result: Putting a linebreak will make them look like normal text
data.expected_result: Mentions and emojis should always appear in bold in chatbox
data.short_description: If you put a linebreak in your message, mentions and emojis won't appear in bold in the textbox
data.steps_to_repro: - Input some mentions and emojis in the chat textbox - Insert a linebreak (sometimes two linebreaks are required, especially if you're putting them in the middle of the message) - You can continue inserting other mentions/emojis if you want
